action_text: Launch Malaysia e-commerce website with localized payment and logistics integration
Develop and launch native iOS and Android mobile applications
Implement AI-powered product recommendation engine across homepage and product pages
Deploy AI chatbot and live chat support to reduce response time to under 30 minutes
Optimize website checkout flow from five steps to three steps to improve conversion rate
Implement advanced analytics platform with real-time executive dashboards
Launch Home and Living product category with at least 300 SKUs
Launch Beauty and Personal Care category with curated brand partnerships
Implement predictive demand forecasting and automated inventory reordering
Transition to 100 percent recyclable packaging and offset delivery carbon emissions
Launch loyalty and referral program to increase repeat purchase rate to 45 percent
Execute SEO and content marketing strategy to increase organic traffic by 65 percent
